div.head: Another
div.ab: ℞ p a little-cooked tile, ground & tempered in white wine with burnt black tracing paper, & if you add burnt horse dung, it will be all the better. Moisten with glair of egg.
Tracing paper burnt over a closed fire is reduced just as charcoal & very soft black, molds neatly & makes it release well mixed with the others.
